nav.div: Elysian Fields Independent School District » News » EFISD Closes Due to COVID19

div.img:
Due to COVID-19 Elysian Fields ISD will remain closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year as Texas Governor Greg Abbot has closed all TX schools in an attempt to protect the public from the COVID-19 virus. Please stay informed by monitoring the District Website, District's Remind Smartphone App or by checking the district's Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook/com/efisdyellowjackets
Thank you for understanding!
